name: Shark Things
description:
A mini-game created for Artificial Intelligence Class.  

The shark is swimming around, followed by 3 fish, looking for prey. You can attract the shark by placing pieces of salmon, and when the shark is hungry enough it starts hunting the small fish that live in the corrals. Help the shark satisfy its appetite and reach the goal until the time runs out.

Music and fish models were acquired from free sources.

Made by:

Guillem Arrojo

Veronika Bolshakova

Joan Mora

Alejandro Reñones
